name: Conga Line Buddies
description:
A small game jam game made for the Friendship Jam!

You play as a robot and must make your way to the dance party by befriending the right robots to reach the end. Beam and make lasting friendship bridges to reach the best robot party ever!

Features:

  • Randomly generated locations for Golden Screws and Robots each run
  • 6 Puzzles
  • A sick Buddy Beam that gets longer the more Buddies you got in your Conga Line
  • Robots with very awful dad jokes
  • Cute Artstyle

Controls [ Keyboard ]

  • [Escape] = Pause
  • [Z] = Buddy Bridge
  • [X or Space] = Buddy Beam
  • [Arrow Keys] = Move

Controls ( x360 Gamepad )

  • (Start) = Pause
  • (A) = Buddy Bridge
  • (B) = Buddy Beam
  • (Left Stick) = Move

Created by:

  • Programmer: Natsu | Twitter
  • Artist: Renoki | Twitter

Music:

  • Title Screen/Dance Party: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=L3AkQzh52YQ
  • Main Game: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GLacOuwXjrg
